Package org.openflow.protocol.instruction

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OFInstruction
    The base class for OFInstruction.
    OFInstructionApplyActions
    Apply Actions.
    OFInstructionClearActions
    clear actions
    OFInstructionExperimenter
    Experimenter's instruction
    OFInstructionGotoDirectTable
    Goto next direct table.
    If next table is not direct table, use OFInstructionGotoTable instead.
    OFInstructionGotoTable
    Goto next table.
    OFInstructionMeter
    Using the Meter( OFInstructionMeter.meterId) to limit the flow rate
    OFInstructionWriteActions
    Write Actions
    OFInstructionWriteMetadata
    Write metadata at OFInstructionWriteMetadata.metadataOffset : OFInstructionWriteMetadata.writeLength using OFInstructionWriteMetadata.value
    OFInstructionWriteMetadataFromPacket
    Write metadata at OFInstructionWriteMetadataFromPacket.metadataOffset with OFInstructionWriteMetadataFromPacket.writeLength, the value from packet at OFInstructionWriteMetadataFromPacket.packetOffset with OFInstructionWriteMetadataFromPacket.writeLength
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OFInstructionType
    List of OpenFlow with POF Instruction types and mappings to wire protocol value and derived classes
